entries.title: Social media influencers charged with $100m stock scheme
entries.description: The defendants allegedly used their platforms to hype stocks before selling them off once the prices rose.

entries.title: Hong Kong markets watchdog warns of cryptocurrency platform risks
entries.description: It comes after the founder of the failed crypto exchange FTX was arrested and charged with fraud.

entries.title: Meta sued for $2bn over Ethiopia violence
entries.description: The case also seeks changes to Facebook’s algorithm, which it alleges fuels hate and violence

entries.title: FTX crypto boss Sam Bankman-Fried denied bail in Bahamas
entries.description: Sam Bankman-Fried is accused of a huge scheme to defraud investors in failed crypto exchange FTX.
